styles.name: anthemic
styles.description: Music suited for anthems, with an easy-to-remember theme, call-and-response lyrics, repetition, and a powerful sound.

styles.name: atmospheric
styles.description: Music that emphasizes timbre and texture, with atmosphere being central to the composition.

styles.name: atonal
styles.description: Music lacking a focus on a key, where notes are played independently of each other.

styles.name: avant-garde
styles.description: Radical, unorthodox, and experimental music challenging norms.

styles.name: chaotic
styles.description: Music characterized by a sense of disorder and confusion.

styles.name: complex
styles.description: Music interconnected with many elements, utilizing changes in tempo, rhythm, melody, and structure.

styles.name: dense
styles.description: Music characterized by a busy, thick, and multi-layered sound.

styles.name: dissonant
styles.description: Music characterized by harsh and inharmonious sound.

styles.name: eclectic
styles.description: Music combining different techniques, styles, and genres.

styles.name: heavy
styles.description: Music that feels powerful through distorted riffs and aggressive performance.

styles.name: lush
styles.description: Music with rich textures and layered instrumentation creating a tender and colorful sound.

styles.name: melodic
styles.description: Music emphasizing melody more than rhythm, harmony, or texture.

styles.name: microtonal
styles.description: Music using intervals smaller than a semitone or alternative tuning systems.

styles.name: minimalistic
styles.description: Music stripped to its essentials with conventional structures and narrow instrumentation.

styles.name: noisy
styles.description: Music emphasizing distorted timbres and textures.

styles.name: polyphonic
styles.description: Music with multiple independent voices of similar importance.

styles.name: progressive
styles.description: Music innovating conventions through structural unity and diverse stylistic influences.

styles.name: raw
styles.description: Music with unrefined and brash delivery.

styles.name: repetitive
styles.description: Music focusing on repetition in riffs, melodies, or patterns.

styles.name: rhythmic
styles.description: Music emphasizing rhythm over other compositional aspects.

styles.name: soft
styles.description: Music characterized by a gentle and quiet sound.

styles.name: sparse
styles.description: Music utilizing little sonic activity or variance.

styles.name: technical
styles.description: Music showcasing expert instrumental skill and complex compositions.
